Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition and signed checklist Overall condition: - Guitar is in excellent condition - Neck is straight and frets are in excellent condition. - All electronics work as they should - No buckle rash, bumps or dings - Light surface swirling from playing - Very small surface scratches, mostly invisible on the pictures Specifications: - C Shape neck profile (between 50' and 60' profile) - Weight is 6 lbs 6 oz - P90 pickups - Kluson Tuners - Guitar is all original Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2012 Gibson SG Standard P90 Limited Edition Ebony with OHSC
